item.title: Doctor Benway Doctor Fauci
item.description: I wish I had never read the book Naked Lunch. Once in a while, though, having read it comes in handy. A Gateway Pundit story about Dr. Anthony Fauci reminded me of something from Naked Lunch. Dr. Benway is the chief antagonist of that wretched book. He is a sadist who advises governments on ways to keep populations compliant and submissive through fear. For example, from Naked Lunch by William S.
